Filtreatment::ft_integer ( $  input  ) 

CHECKS FOR AN INTEGER

if the $minval and|or $maxval are set, a comparison will be performed

NOTE: because the function can return 0 also as a valid result, check with === the return value

Parameters:
int $input - what to check/transform
Returns:
int|bool

Filtreatment::ft_strregex ( $  value,
$  regex,
$  cv = 1 
)

WORKS ON A STRING WITH REGEX EXPRESSION

checks a string for specified characters

Parameters:
string $value - variable to sanitize
string $regex - is in a special form detailed below: it contains ONLY allowed characters, ANY other characters making invalid string it must NOT contain begin/end delimitators /[... ]/ eg: 0-9, 0-9A-Za-z, AERS
int $cv - 1 or 2
Returns:
string|bool return string if check succeed ($cv = 1) or string with replaced chars
